original_text: “Do not turn to mediums or necromancers; do not seek them out, and so make yourselves unclean by them: I am the Lord your God.
korean_text: 너희는 신접한 자와 박수를 믿지 말며 그들을 추종하여 스스로 더럽히지 말라 나는 너희 하나님 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: Do not turn to mediums or necromancers
and so make yourselves unclean by them
I am the Lord your God.
